thread.title: Erin

author: Erin
title: Erin
text: The only reason I did not give this 5 stars is because the initial person I talked with was rude, condescending, and not helpful with my questions whatsoever. The check in experience was wonderful, timely, and the cabin was very clean and exactly the way it was described. We had an issue with the lock on the door (battery died and we were unable to enter) and they had someone over with minutes. I would use them again, and I would stay at the very same cabin again. Our family had a wonderful time!
